channel.title: Hitpoints reset
channel.description: When someone dies on my server there hitpoints reset to 0. This makes it so there stuck where they re-spawn can't move, tele, or anything. Unless you go into characters and make the hitpoints 99 again. Dose anyone know where can I fix this problem?
